item.title: About
item.description: I am an independent software engineer based in London, UK. I mostly work on financial trading systems, previously I worked a ThoughtWorks. I was a grad at University of York and I was an undergrad at the University of Sydney. I have skills in a broad range of programming languages and paradigms (which includes Java, Python, C# and F#) prefer to use the best tool for the job Contact Isaiah PGP Key Contact details
